alert.note: Alert for Athens; Gallia; Meigs; Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong line of thunderstorms will impact portions of Meigs, northeastern Gallia, western Washington, southwestern Morgan, southeastern Athens, northwestern Mason, western Wirt, northwestern Roane, northern Jackson and Wood Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1214 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong line of thunderstorms over Tuppers Plains, or near Coolville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Athens, Marietta, Belpre, Point Pleasant, Pomeroy, Racine, Coolville, Rutland, Chesterhill, Forked Run State Park, Vienna, Ravenswood, Williamstown, New Haven, Mason, Sandyville, Mineralwells, Washington and Tuppers Plains. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 140 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 10. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
